tool_description: This project is a simple Flask based API that generates QR code images from a given URL. It uses the qrcode package to generate QR code images and the flask package to create a simple REST API.
title: QRify Code Generator

api_list.name: QRify Code URL to Image Generator
api_list.description: This project is a simple Flask based API that generates QR code images from a given URL. It uses the QRcode package to generate QR code images and the Flask package to create a simple REST API.
